author: Sophia Chen
title: To Beat Covid-19, Scientists Try to 'See' the Invisible Enemy
description: Using beams of X-rays and electrons, researchers are creating a moving model of the coronavirus in order to discover its weaknesses.
content: But the CDC illustration is far from the full picture. For one thing, each virus particle is not identical. Researchers have now observed that some virus particles are spherical, while others are more egg-shaped. Their sizes vary, with diameters ranging from … [+2891 chars]
